sense.def:
A barricade
je vrsta vozil ali drugih predmetov, postavljenih počez na cesti, tako da ljudje ne morejo mimo.

To barricade a road or passage
pomeni postaviti nekaj poprek čez cesto ali prehod, tako da ljudje ne morejo mimo.

To barricade oneself
pomeni postaviti nekaj težkega k vratom sobe ali stavbe, da drugi ne morejo noter.

seg.quote: We rushed into the bedroom and barricaded ourselves in.
They were barricaded behind concrete slabs.
